ygData.subject: Uphill battle
ygData.msgSnippet: Galvatron was done with his brother and now could finish with his friends. Apocalypse swung the flame sword at his neck while shooting fires out of his wrist

Subject: Uphill battle
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

 Galvatron was done with his brother and now could finish with his friends. 
Apocalypse swung the flame sword at his neck while shooting fires out of his 
wrist blade. Death swung his reaver at Galva's legs.
 Galva thought to himself... "Not bad....not bad." He swung up in a flip roll 
doging all the shots and landed behind them both. He crushed his hand through 
Death's back. The bot was in stasis lock now he was finished. Weak....
    Apocalypse looked at Death's broken body. "We didnt land a shot. We will 
remady that." he pulled his sword and prepared battle. Galvatron crowched a 
small gun pulled from his forearm. He shot a few shots through the bots chest.
  Galvatron looked at the bot. He was finished also...
 "It cant be...." Apocalypse looked at the two broken bodies.... "Now to 
pprepare. He glowed and hovered in the air. This task would take some energy. 
It would take time to power up.
